title: Projects
description: A collection of applications I designed and developed to strengthen my problem-solving skills and explore modern web technologies.

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: A scalable real-time chat platform that enables users to communicate instantly through secure and responsive messaging. The application supports user authentication, real-time message broadcasting, and optimized backend event handling. Special focus was placed on performance, clean UI architecture, and maintaining a seamless user experience across devices.
details: Designed responsive and minimal chat interface.

projects.title: Productivity App
projects.description: A task and productivity management application built to help users organize workflows efficiently. It includes dynamic task creation, filtering, and state-based updates with an intuitive layout. The goal was to focus on structured state handling, scalable architecture, and building a polished, user-friendly interface.
details: Developed full CRUD task management system.
Optimized UI for clarity and responsiveness.
